From Indicator: H1 Abatement of the number of invasive non-native species entering and establishing against a baseline
To Indicator: D4 Relative abundance and distribution of widespread species
Rationale: The H1 indicator contains 193 non-native species that are considered to be exerting a negative impact on native biodiversity.

From Indicator: H1 Abatement of the number of invasive non-native species entering and establishing against a baseline
To Indicator: D5 Conservation status of our native species
Rationale: The H1 indicator contains 193 non-native species that are considered to be exerting a negative impact on native biodiversity.

To Indicator: D6 Abundance and distribution of priority species in England

From Indicator: H2 Distribution of invasive non-native species and plant pests and diseases
To Indicator: D4 Relative abundance and distribution of widespread species
Rationale: Preventing the spread of invasive non-native species limits their ability to disrupt ecosystems.
